roleset.name: seem, appear, to the ear
roleset.note: SOUND-V NOTES: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison to 'seem'. Member of VNcls stimulus_subject-30.4. (from sound.01-v)
SOUNDING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from sounding.01-j)

example.name: just arg1
example.text: How does a nice new tax, say 5%, on any financial transaction sound?
example.arg: a nice new tax, say 5%, on any financial transaction

example.name: all args
example.text: John sounds to me like a real idiot.

roleset.name: make a sound, production of noise
roleset.note: SOUND-V NOTES: Member of Vncls sound_existence-47.4, sound_emission-43.2. (from sound.02-v)
SOUND-N NOTES: Added by Julia based partially on sound-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls sound_existence-47.4, sound_emission-43.2. (from sound.01-n)

role.descr: the sound itself (the name of the sound/song, etc., not just a characteristic)

example.name: alarm
example.text: John sounded the alarm: "The British are coming, the British are coming!"
example.arg: the alarm: "The British are coming, the British are coming!"

example.name: just arg2
example.text: Our citizens were massacred to the sound of that anthem

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Moments later , another shot and the sound of someone in pain .

example.name: arg3
example.text: They hollow out the bat and stick the cork in there to mask the hollow sound .

example.name: noisy secret- args 1 and 3
example.text: Despite its clunking sound it was one of Hitler 's secret weapons .

example.name: arg1
example.text: listen to the sound of the waves the wind makes in the rice paddies to discover if the rice is ripe ;
example.arg: of the waves the wind makes in the rice paddies

example.name: sunken junk- arg3
example.text: It is said that , late at night , the sunken junks make moaning sounds .

roleset.name: do an ultrasound
roleset.note: SOUND-V NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to xray. No FN or VN classes. Framed by Katie. (from sound.04-v)

roleset.name: offer an opinion or complaint about something
roleset.note: SOUND_OFF-V NOTES: predicate added by Arrick. No VNcls. (from sound.03-v)

example.name: complain
example.text: In our new 'Talk Back to the Media' segment, someone who believes he or she 's been treated unfairly by the press gets the chance *PRO* to sound off and give their side of the controversy.
